name: Kronos Quartet
description: The '''Kronos Quartet''' is an American [[string quartet]] based in San Francisco. It has been in existence with a rotating membership of musicians for 50 years. The quartet covers a very broad range of musical genres, including [[contemporary classical music]]. More than 1,000 works have been [[commission (art)|written for it]]. The quartet has recorded over 40 albums and received a number of awards.
